name: test_e2e_with_logs[353_CMD_PIPE_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_PIPE_003` |
| **Name** | Network stats piped to grep |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | pipe |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `netstat -an | grep LISTEN`
- **Encoded**: `netstat%20-an%20%7C%20grep%20LISTEN`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~22000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:29:45.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_PIPE_003-1769916585762-tgbj4 pattern_id=CMD_PIPE_003 uri=/?q=netstat%20-an%20%7C%20grep%20LISTEN client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
